name: U Host
summary: Have you ever wanted to create your own Game Show? Well now you can!

name: Uh Oh Bartender
summary: In Uh Oh Bartender, you take the role of a bartender at Cypher's, the hottest new bar and grill. However, the drinks served at Cypher's aren't just drinks, they are also puzzles! In order to serve these drinks, you will have to decipher their ingredients based on rules found inside the procedurally generated names!

name: UHR-Warlords
summary:
UHR-Warlords is a turn-based tactical boardgame with endless possibilities. Play against AI or friends (or enemies)! Play the epic campaigns, immerse yourself in the lands of Noordh and join the everlasting war! Play as any of the Warlords and defeat your opponent. Use the Mystical Creatures at your command. Rain fire down on your foes with Lava or play to your advantage using a variety of Magical Runes. This game is all about the tactics you choose and how you adapt to your enemy's moves.
Follow the story of Hornar in his quest to conquer the throne and become The Frozen King, or join Kriegh in his campaign to set the world ablaze!

name: Uh-Oh!
summary: Uh-Oh! is an open-world survival game where there is no mandatory goal, so you can set your own goals by playing as a survivor in a single-player or multiplayer experience.

name: Uh Oh Calico!
summary: Prepare yourself for a challenging, strategic, exciting and fur-strating puzzle game! Inspired by the popular Watermelon Game comes this 3D cat-tastic game of combining growing cats in a confined claw machine. Make combos and get the highest score without letting any cats fall out!

name: Uhilant
summary: Cozy, turn-based puzzle game set in a dystopian land overshadowed by a long war. You've made the bold choice to survive instead of becoming cannon fodder. Now You are - "The Uhilant", war dodger. Immerse yourself in this charming adventure, where every move brings you closer to freedom

name: Uh Oh Airlines
summary: Uh Oh Airlines is a silly, casual, single player or couch co-op flight attendant simulator where you and a friend perform normal flight attendant duties, but must also wrangle your passengers to make it through the day.

name: Uh Oh!
summary: Play through three VHS tapes, uncovering the mystery of a decrepit facility, eluding tormented beasts, and discovering the truth of the chosen one.
